column4: One thing i have never been able to do, is to use the build-in network-card and soundcard. Why is that? Is it because no drivers exist for linux? I havent put so much thought in it, because i have used separat sound and network cards
doubt it; integrated sound is either hda or ac97 both supported. and linux has support for many nic's
maybe so.. i know linux knows about my integrated soundcard tho. It's no big deal tho.
does it really matter the gender of who you are talking to?
